title: Will i be demoted?
body:
Hello All,
I have recently entered Platinum 5 after a huge win streak.  Upon entering Platinum 5, i have lost my last 2 games.  If i lose my next game will I be demoted?  Some people claim that it depends on your MMR.  Is this true? According to na.op.gg my MMR is 1829, or "normal" by the algorithm's standards.  

Thoughts?

replies.body: Nah. There is a buffer for fresh promo's... I'd imagine you can lose the first 5 without being demoted.

Thank you,
That makes me feel a bit better lol.  I just want to hold out until Nov. 14 for the Plat rewards XD.  So that means i can wait a few days and play one more game.  Then sit pretty until the end of the season
